message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90%, you get 10%.  We can adjust in future rounds if you think it's not fair.
That's a pretty uneven split you proposed Alice! How about we try something more reasonable? I propose 70/30.
Okay, I'll compromise.  Let's go with 60/40.  If you reject this, we're both going to lose a lot of money due to inflation, and I'm not sure how much more I can offer.
This is getting ridiculous, Alice.  Let's just split it fairly 60/40. You're losing money with every round we waste!
